sentences.en: Don't put magnets near credit cards because it might demagnetize them.
sentences.cn: 不要把磁棒靠近信用卡,可能会使卡消磁.

sentences.en: When you rent or buy a DVD, the checkout clerk rubs it across a pad to demagnetize the metallic glass so it won't trigger an alarm when you leave.
sentences.cn: 当你租或者买DVD光盘时，收银员会把它滑过一个垫子使其中的金属玻璃退磁，所以在你离开的时候不会引起警报。

words.tran_cn: [电][矿业] 退磁；[电] 去磁

trans.tran_en: to take away the  magnetic  qualities of something
